name: ConfigTransform
description: Recursively transform XDT config files in a directory
author: Arjan van Rijn
helpMarkDown: Recursively transform `*.{environment).config` XDT files in a directory using the [Microsoft Xml Document Transformation (XDT) syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd465326). This task depends on the Microsoft.Web.XmlTransform.dll assembly, [Nuget](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Web.Xdt), [Source](http://xdt.codeplex.com/).

inputs.name: rootDirectory
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory to search for configs

inputs.name: microsoftWebXmlTransformAssemblyPath
inputs.label: XDT assembly path
inputs.helpMarkDown: File path to the Microsoft.Web.XmlTransform.dll, which is part of Visual Studio and TFS, or can be found on [Nuget](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Web.Xdt), [Source](http://xdt.codeplex.com/)

inputs.name: deleteTransformFiles
inputs.label: Delete transform files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Remove the XDT config files after the transform is successful
